subject: Difference in pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I don't understand your change in pedals. What is the différence between
the :
Pro x upgrade
Pro x ultra

If it's only the controller, can it be flashed?
Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Richard Artes,  With the release of the VAM PRO voice coil motor, the original ProX and ProX Upgrade controller hardware is no longer compatible with this new model. However, they are still fully compatible with the standard VAM vibration motors.
